TestCase.name: NoGroupByNoCountAggSingleMode
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_no_group_no_count_single as select sum(v1) as V from t

RwStreamMaterializedView(v=[$0]) RwStreamProject(v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($1, $0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], v=[SUM($0)], Row Count=[COUNT()]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1])

TestCase.name: NoGroupByHasCountAggSingleMode
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_no_group_has_count_single as select Count(*), Sum(v1) as V from t

RwStreamMaterializedView(EXPR$0=[$0], v=[$1]) RwStreamProject(EXPR$0=[$0], v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $1)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($0)]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1])

TestCase.name: HasGroupByHasCountAggSingleMode
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_has_group_has_count_single as select v2, Count(*), Sum(v1) as V from t group by v2

RwStreamMaterializedView(v2=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], v=[$2]) RwStreamProject(v2=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($1, $2)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v2,v1])

TestCase.name: HasGroupByNoCountAggSingleMode
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_has_group_no_count_single as select v2, Sum(v1) as V from t group by v2

RwStreamMaterializedView(v2=[$0], v=[$1]) RwStreamProject(v2=[$0], v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($2, $1)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], v=[SUM($1)], Row Count=[COUNT()]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v2,v1])
